title: End of Japanese community
author: phantomathkg
aiHeadline: Japanese community on Mozilla's support forum officially calls it quits, leaving behind a legacy of... well, not much, really.

title: FBI tries to unmask owner of archive.is
author: Projectiboga
aiHeadline: FBI's latest move: unmasking the elusive archive.is owner. Because nothing says 'fun' like a game of digital hide and seek with the law.

title: Kimi K2 Thinking, a SOTA open-source trillion-parameter reasoning model
author: nekofneko
aiHeadline: Kimi K2 Thinking: because one trillion parameters are just enough to make you question the meaning of life... and your RAM usage.

title: ICC ditches Microsoft 365 for openDesk
author: vincvinc
aiHeadline: ICC switches from Microsoft 365 to openDesk: because who needs proprietary software when you can have open-source greatness? Now with 100% more freedom and 0% less PowerPoint templates.
